resources.string: Happy birthday to my gorgeous, smart, and loyal friend. Live your best life!
Happy birthday to one of the most special people in my life. Wishing you many more.
You’re one of a kind and deserve everything that this special day brings! I hope your day is as special as you are, friend.
Happy birthday to my beautiful friend! You are the best!
You make the world a better and brighter place.
Wishing nothing but love and happiness on your special day. I am so proud to be your friend.
We’ve made so many wonderful memories togethers. Cheers to many more.
Today a true queen was born and I’m so happy to be in your court.
In good times and bad, I’ll always be by your side. Happy birthday friend!
